sys_ui_macro.name: ui_slushbucket
sys_ui_macro.xml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <j:jelly trim="true" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null"> <g:evaluate jelly="true"> var users= new GlideRecord('sys_user'); users.query(); </g:evaluate> <g:ui_slushbucket name="sb" left_header="Assignments Available" right_header="Assignments Selected"> <j:while test="${users.next()}"> <option value="${users.sys_id}" title="${users.name}"> ${users.name} </option> </j:while> </g:ui_slushbucket> </j:jelly>
